sentences.en: A flick of the wrist; gave my horse a flick with the reins.
sentences.cn: 手腕轻轻的一击; 用鞭子轻抽了一下我的马.

sentences.en: Anything you need is only a flick of your tail away.
sentences.cn: 您只要随便招呼一声就能得到您要的.

sentences.en: At times a flick of self - preservation burned through the fog of reverie.
sentences.cn: 有时求生本能的火花也会在梦幻的浓雾中突然闪烁一下.

sentences.en: During the fight with a rival gang he lashed out with his flick knife.
sentences.cn: 在与敌对帮派的打斗中，他挥舞着弹簧折刀一通猛刺。

sentences.en: Edna: At least it would be a short flick!
sentences.cn: 埃德娜: 至少那将是一部短片!

sentences.en: flick through the phone book and pick a company.
He changed the channel with a flick of the remote.
sentences.cn: 他按了一下遥控器,换了个台.

sentences.en: He gave a flick of the whip.
He hit the ball with just a flick of the wrist.
sentences.cn: 他只用手腕轻轻一抖,打出了那个球.

sentences.en: He turned the pancake over with a strong flick of his wrist.
sentences.cn: 他一抖腕子就把饼翻过来了.

sentences.en: His tongue flicked across his lips.
sentences.cn: 他的舌头在双唇间快速移动。

sentences.en: I thought I'dhave a quick flick through some recent issues.
sentences.cn: 我想我得快速浏览一下最近发生的事情。

sentences.en: I want to see the new Harrison Ford flick.
sentences.cn: 我想看哈里逊?福特主演的那部新片.

sentences.en: I'll just flick through the pages until I find the right section.
sentences.cn: 我会快速地翻页，直到找到要找的那一部分。

sentences.en: Papa flicked the ash from his cigar.
sentences.cn: 爸爸弹去雪茄上的烟灰。

sentences.en: Polysilicon moved from shortage to glut flick a light switch.
sentences.cn: 瞬息之间,多晶硅供应便从短缺变成了过剩.

sentences.en: She sent the shuttlecock flying over the net with a practised flick of the wrist.
sentences.cn: 她熟练地轻抖手腕,把羽毛球击过了网.

sentences.en: The jockey said he tended to flick horses with the whip.
sentences.cn: 骑手说他经常会用鞭子抽马。

sentences.en: With a flick of the wrist , Frye sent the ball into the opposite court.
sentences.cn: 弗赖伊手腕一甩，把球送到了对方半场。

words.tran_cn: 闪烁的，忽隐忽现的；摇曳的
闪烁；摇曳；颤动；扑动翅膀；假装昏倒

phrases.tran_cn: 浏览，飞快翻阅（书，文件集）

phrases.phrase: give someone the flick (或 get the flick)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主澳)随便唐突地拒绝（或被拒）

trans.tran_cn: 轻弹，轻拂，快速的轻打，轻弹声，电影
trans.tran_en: a short quick sudden movement or hit with a part of your body, whip etc

trans.tran_cn: 轻弹，轻击，轻拂，忽然摇动
trans.tran_en: to make something move away by hitting or pushing it suddenly or quickly, especially with your thumb and finger
